resources.string: Bedivere may only be included with the \"Excalibur\" variant.
When selected for a mission, if Bedivere is not given Excalibur, Bedivere MUST throw a Failure card, if he is given Excalibur he may act normally. Bedivere is otherwise a loyal servant.
Bedivere is an advantage to the minions of Mordred
Guinevere may only be included with the \"Lancelot\" variants #1 and #2.
Guinevere learns the identity of both Lancelots during the reveal phase, Guinevere is otherwise a loyal servant of Arthur.
Guinevere is an advantage to the Loyal servants.
Galahad may only be included with the \"Lady of the Lake\"" variant.
When the loyal Galahad is forced to reveal his loyalty card to the Lady of the Lake, he must select the card that indicates he is a minion of Mordred.
Galahad is an advantage to the minions of Mordred.
The Resistance: Avalon can be purchased from Indie Games and Cards.
Credit to r/BoardGames and Board Game Geek for the additional roles of Bedivere and Guinevere.
